'''Húrin I''' ([[Third Age]] {{TA|2124|n}}<ref name="Elendil"/> – {{TA|2244|n}},<ref name="South">{{App|South}}</ref> aged 120 years) was the fifth [[Ruling Steward]] of Gondor.

==History==
Húrin was one of the Stewards during the [[Watchful Peace]], when [[Sauron]] was in the [[East]] and the [[Nazgûl]] occupied [[Minas Morgul]].<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref>

Húrin ruled as Steward for forty years, and was succeeded by his son, who became [[Túrin I]].<ref name="South"/>

==Etymology==
For the meaning of his name refer to [[Húrin of Emyn Arnen#Etymology|Húrin of Emyn Arnen - Etymology]]. Húrin I was probably named after [[Húrin|Húrin Thalion]], one of the heroes of the [[Edain]] in the [[First Age]].<ref>{{NM|P2v}}, footnote 3, p. 189</ref><ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 203</ref>
